com.jidesoft.editor.action
Class DefaultInputHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.event.KeyAdapter
      com.jidesoft.editor.action.InputHandler
          com.jidesoft.editor.action.DefaultInputHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class DefaultInputHandler
extends InputHandler

The default input handler. It maps sequences of keystrokes into actions and inserts key typed events into the text area. Internally, it used ShortcutSchemaManager from JIDE Shortcut Editor to define all the shortcuts. By default, there are two ShortcutSchemas - one is the default one, EditorShortcutSchema; the other is MacOSXEditorShortcutSchema for Mac OSX.

Version:
$Id: DefaultInputHandler.java,v 1.2 2003/11/22 03:39:20 bradford Exp $
Author:
Slava Pestov
